programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Sound Of A Flower
programme.desc: In the strict Confucian society of 19th century Korea, a girl takes destiny into her own hands to become Korea’s first female master singer in the traditional art of pansori.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: An elderly woman forms an unlikely friendship with a junior civil service officer. After realizing that he is proficient in English, she begs he officer to teach her, for reasons of her own.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. A veteran cop and his special task force are assigned on the case, however, the kidnapper catches wind of the police involvement…

programme.title: Bluebeard
programme.desc: A sedated patient confesses to his doctor that he and his son are both involved in an unsolved serial murder case.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Shoot Me In The Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: The Wicked
programme.desc: Sae Young is the new hire at a small office treated harshly by her manager. After picking on Sae Young in her backhanded ways, she soon finds herself the target of Sae Young's wicked ways.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. A veteran cop and his special task force are assigned on the case, however, the kidnapper catches wind of the police involvement…

programme.title: The Sound Of A Flower
programme.desc: In the strict Confucian society of 19th century Korea, a girl takes destiny into her own hands to become Korea’s first female master singer in the traditional art of pansori.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: An elderly woman forms an unlikely friendship with a junior civil service officer. After realizing that he is proficient in English, she begs he officer to teach her, for reasons of her own.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Be With You

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep827828
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45054506
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1961
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3508
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45074508
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1763
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3349
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2512
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1026
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep29
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3536
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep423
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep1617
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: After several years of marriage, Prof. Wu Te-sheng (Alex Man Chi-leung) and his wife Wan Chun (Patricia Ha Man-jik) decide to have children. Then a medical examination shows Wu is the cause of the couple's infertility, and Wu reluctantly adopts his doctor's advice to have his wife artificially inseminated in Hawaii.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: As The Light Goes Out
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve in Hong Kong, a Team of firefighters battle an out-of-control warehouse fire that threatens to plunge the entire city into darkness. The team must put their differences aside and come together for an ultimate battle to stop the fire spreading to a nearby power plant.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: Love triangles or quadrangles rule, as a group of young people get entangled in a web of love and emotions. Director Doe Chin, renowned for his dramas and musicals, knows just how to tug at the heartstrings.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Asuraguru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Vetrivel
programme.desc: In a bid to help his younger brother unite with the girl he loves, Vetrivel and his friends decide to kidnap her. Things take an ugly turn when their plan goes wrong and results in messy situations

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Wild Dog
programme.desc: A series of deadly attacks occur that pose a threat to national security. In response, a brash but brilliant intelligence agent leads a covert operation to find the perpetrators.

programme.title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
programme.desc: Sree Kumar, a young man, falls in love with Sindhuja, a vivacious woman. However, complications soon arise and they part their separate ways only to reunite again.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Tuck Jagadish
programme.desc: In a village with greedy property fights among the families, Jagadish (Nani) carries on his father's legacy to reform all the property issues in his village while trying to reunite his family, which is also split due to property issues.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Balle Vellayatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: 2 brothers from India working in Kuwait are sentenced to death penalty for killing an srilankan women. Day before there hanging the news breakout in an Indian news channel by a lady reporter.

programme.title: Greatfather
programme.desc: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Kaadan
programme.desc: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Kolamaavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Watan Ke Rakhwale

programme.title: Beqabu

programme.title: Mera Vachan Geeta Ki Qasam
programme.desc: Haria, a bandit killer, accidentally kills an innocent woman. Filled with guilt, he adopts her daughter and decides to raise her.

programme.title: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani
programme.desc: Ajay Bakshi and Ria Banerji are two rival TV reporters and will stop at nothing to outdo each other. Finally, they team up to help a man seek justice for his daughter who was raped by a politician.

programme.title: Dashing Kundi
programme.desc: As Pramila arrives in NYC in search of employment, Vicky, a lover of adventure, helps her navigate some mortifying situations. She is smitten with him but is devastated when he does not reciprocate.

programme.title: Aa Dekhen Zara
programme.desc: Photographer Ray Acharya, who has not seen much of success considering his potential, inherits a magical camera from his grandfather that transforms his life completely.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Imtihan
programme.desc: Vicky, a popular singer, meets and falls in love with Preeti, who does not reciprocate his feelings but agrees to marry him. Soon, he realises that she is hiding something about her past.

programme.title: Fraud Saiyaan
programme.desc: Bhola, a con artist, travels around the city wooing various women into marrying him in a bid to satisfy his monetary needs. However, he soon gets into trouble due to his dishonest ways.

programme.title: Asli Fighter
programme.desc: In order to free their imprisoned boss, a group of terrorists plan to bomb a flyover in Hyderabad. Amid all the chaos, unfortunately, Krishna and Mango get entangled in their plan.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Power Unlimited
programme.desc: Tirupathi, who wants to become a police officer, must pose as ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to rescue Ganguly, the brother of the Home Minister Jayavardhan.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: A ghost falls in love with a newly-wed woman. To be closer to her, he follows her and takes on the guise of her husband while the latter is away on business.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: A ghost falls in love with a newly-wed woman. To be closer to her, he follows her and takes on the guise of her husband while the latter is away on business.

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.

programme.title: Warning
programme.desc: A group of friends go for a yacht ride to celebrate their friend's birthday. However, their party turns into a misadventure when they decide to go swimming and they encounter a dangerous predator.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to save himself and Gudia, Sanju enters the Chaudhary household by posing as their NRI relative to swindle money from them.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: Pappu Can't Dance Saala
programme.desc: Next-door neighbours Vidyadhar, an orthodox Hindu man, and Mehak, an urban dancer, cannot stand each other. However, they must live together when their apartments get raided.

programme.title: Don No.1
programme.desc: Surya is a gangster who helps the underprivileged sections of society. His life takes a turn for the worse when a Pakistani criminal decides to join hands with him.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Maharathi
programme.desc: After his boss, Jai Singh, commits suicide, Subhash, a chauffeur, hatches a plan to win his insurance money. He teams up with Jai's wife, Mallika, to make the suicide look like a well-planned murder.

programme.title: Meri Zindagi Ek Agneepath
programme.desc: Ramakrishna, a mechanic, is framed for the murder of his wife by his father-in-law who then takes his son away from him. Following his release, Ramakrishna sets out to find his child.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

programme.title: The Champ
programme.desc: Billy Flynn, who used to be a champion boxer, barely earns enough money to keep himself and his boy alive when his ex-wife, Annie returns. She has remarried and become successful and she wants custody of their child. Now to keep the son who adores him, Flynn must train, fight and find it within himself to once again become The Champ.

programme.desc: As he trudges through the snow to school, faces the neighborhood bully and visits a malevolent department store Santa Claus, Ralphie connives, conspires and campaigns for the most fabulous Christmas present ever in this heartwarming, hysterical and sweetly nostalgic holiday film.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Kobayashi Maru - After months spent reconnecting the Federation with distant worlds, Captain Michael Burnham and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery are sent to assist a damaged space station.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: More Now - Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, SC.

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Along with a group of teens and Boots the Monkey, Dora embarks on a quest to save her parents while trying to solve the mystery behind a lost Incan civilization.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna
programme.desc: When Haller’s sister, Sophie, is abducted by a ruthless gang, he decides to pursue them without involving the police. Together with his assistant, Niko, they expertly use their wits and intelligence to outsmart the criminals and bring Sophie to safety.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Stranded in a hotel on a storm-swept island, Katrin has a fun-filled flirt with Peter, the only other guest. The next day, Katrin is relieved to return home to her loving marriage. Until Peter appears at her friend’s wedding - with his wife.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: Black Bread
programme.desc: Best Film winner at the Goya Awards, 2011, Black Bread unfolds in post-war Catalonia. A young boy discovers the bodies of a man and a boy in the woods and his father is blamed for the deaths. To clear his father’s name, he must find the real killers.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Young Fit… And Almost Good Looking
programme.desc: In a moment of sheer serendipity, Alessandro and Anna’s destinies cross path in a restaurant when both their dates don’t turn up. They spend a wild adventurous night with one another but at dawn, both will be forced to confront their past and feelings.

programme.title: Veins of the World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: Flying Fish
programme.desc: Through three different but interconnected stories, we follow three young characters – a young girl, a lovelorn woman and a widow, mother of eight children - and their painful personal journeys set against the backdrop of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Young Fit… And Almost Good Looking
programme.desc: In a moment of sheer serendipity, Alessandro and Anna’s destinies cross path in a restaurant when both their dates don’t turn up. They spend a wild adventurous night with one another but at dawn, both will be forced to confront their past and feelings.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. III - Borchert and the Last Hope
programme.desc: Thomas Borchert, an “unlicensed attorney” is consulted by the family of architect Anton Schenider who died from Multiple Sclerosis. The family suspects malpractice on the part of his neurologist, but the autopsy creates more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Veins of the World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Murder In The Larzac
programme.desc: An important breeder has been assassinated. The case is complex as there are several possible suspects – the lovelorn girlfriend, the jealous ex-wife, the rugby player foe or the farmer he fell out with? The truth is buried deep beneath secrets and lies.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: A Summer in Tuscany
programme.desc: Laura, a journalist, travels to Italy to investigate illegal fashion labour practices and find out more about a family secret. She is soon courted by the charming lawyer Alessandro, but eventually realizes that he isn’t all that he proclaims to be.

programme.title: Hide N' Run
programme.desc: A little girl’s game of “police and thief” with her father is interrupted by the outbreak of riots. Through her perspective, we follow her as she escapes from the shophouse unaware of the chaos unfolding around her.

programme.title: Murder In The Larzac
programme.desc: An important breeder has been assassinated. The case is complex as there are several possible suspects – the lovelorn girlfriend, the jealous ex-wife, the rugby player foe or the farmer he fell out with? The truth is buried deep beneath secrets and lies.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: The Summer Of Flying Fish
programme.desc: While on vacation with her father, Manena experiences first love, and witnesses the friction between her father, a rich landowner obsessed with exterminating all carp fish in his lagoon, and the local Mapuche tribe who decides to stand up to him.

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 6
programme.desc: Mary gets a call from an old friend needing help. Latika struggles with being a Hunter. John’s eagerness, and commitment to the Hunt worries Mary.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 2
programme.desc: With Spooner (LISSETH CHAVEZ) on board, the Legends find themselves tracking an alien in 1950s San Bernardino and trying to figure out what’s sending the town on a feeding frenzy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 7
programme.desc: Bernadette pressures Howard to move out of his mother’s house, while Sheldon finds himself caught in the middle of a fight between Amy and Wil Wheaton.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

But an unholy night of horror awaits as Annabelle awakens the evil spirits in the room, who all set their sights on a new target—the Warrens’ ten year-old daughter, Judy, and her friends.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 11
programme.desc: SEEKING FORGIVENESS — As Courtney (Brec Bassinger), Sylvester (Joel McHale) and the JSA plot to take down a major threat, the arrival of someone from their past sends shock waves through the town.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: Life As We Know It
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy's Katherine Heigl and Transformers' Josh Duhamel play polar opposites Holly and Eric. After a disastrous first date, the only thing they have in common is their dislike for each other and their love for their goddaughter, Sophie. But when they suddenly become all Sophie has in the world, they are forced to put their differences aside. Juggling career ambitions and competing social calendars, they'll have to find some common ground while living under one roof -- and deal with life as we know it. Directed by Greg Berlanti (Brothers and Sisters, Dawson's Creek), this romantic drama also features Mad Men's Christina Hendricks and more.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For a factory worker named Douglas Quaid, even though he has a beautiful wife who he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life - real memories of life as a super-spy might be just what he needs. But when the procedure goes horribly wrong, Quaid becomes a hunted man. Finding himself on the run from the police - controlled by Chancellor Cohaagen, the leader of the free world - Quaid teams up with a rebel fighter to find the head of the underground resistance and stop Cohaagen. The line between fantasy and reality becomes blurred, and the fate of his world hangs in the balance as Quaid discovers his true identity, his true love, and his true fate.

programme.desc: The Economy Drive - Pruning the civil service is a great political platform for the Minister but the idea is upsetting to Sir Humphrey Appleby. He explains that the civil service measures its success by the size of its staff and budget.

programme.desc: Silence - When the detectives are called to the scene of a murder in a church, they find that the young man responsible for the crime, had been receiving payoffs from the church to cover up his sexual abuse by a priest.

programme.desc: No Sweat - The summer heat has the members of the 4077th wrestling with hot, sleepless nights as well as a heap of personal problems. Hot Lips has a case of prickly heat that is causing her to be even more pointed than usual, while B.J. is tossing and turning over a troubling letter from Peg. Meanwhile, Klinger’s decision to practice lessons from his mail correspondence electronics course has wrought havoc on the company’s P.A. system. To make matters worse, Charles decides to prepare a mammoth tax return in the mess tent.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Truth About Holly - Hawke and Dominic must protect Dominic's niece from a dangerous drug kingpin and find a new employee for Santini Air.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Disco Baby/ Alas, Poot Dwyer/ After The War/ Ticket To Ride/ Itsy Bitsy Part 2 - At their high-school reunion, Julie and her former boyfriend find they'll still attracted to each other.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep23
programme.desc: The Horse's Mouth - Samantha turns a runaway racehorse into an attractive woman to find out why she escaped. In her human form, the horse tells Samantha that her name is Dally Ran.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Affairs Of The Heart - Carla’s new love interest could die from too much excitement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Silence - When the detectives are called to the scene of a murder in a church, they find that the young man responsible for the crime, had been receiving payoffs from the church to cover up his sexual abuse by a priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep01
programme.desc: Chameleon - The detectives search for an ex-con who is sexually assaulting prostitutes only to find their suspect murdered. The homicide reveals what may be a string of brutal murders by a female serial killer.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Big Brother - Jim Hacker MP is having some problems with decision making at the same time as he sets out to protect people's right to privacy. He meets with stiff resistance from Sir Humphrey.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep16
programme.desc: It Ain't Over 'til Mrs. Howser Sings - While cleaning out the Howser garage, Doogie and Vinnie find some old home movies and screen them. One of them shows Mrs. Howser dressed as a 1960’s hippy singing with a rock band.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep16
programme.desc: The Courtship of Wyatt's Father - Gideon makes a deal with the Darklighters to get rid of Leo, but they accidentally send Leo and Piper to the Ghostly plane, leaving Phoebe and Paige to believe that they are both dead.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep22
programme.desc: The Sicilian Encounter - While on a case in Sicily, British intelligence agent Michael Haggerty (Len Cariou) becomes involved with a widow (Deidre Hall) who is under the watchful eye of volatile in-laws.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep02
programme.desc: Deception - A kindergartner's family portrait leads the detectives to suspect the child's actress mother Gloria of seducing her teenage stepson Kyle into a long-term sexual affair.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep03
programme.desc: Vulnerable - When a senile woman is found wandering and abused, the detectives first suspect her scheming son, as their victim is unable to recall her attacker or attack.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep05
programme.desc: The Writing on the Wall - While battling one another on the civil service reduction issue, the Minister and Sir Humphrey learn of a plan that would adversely affect them both. Their own department is now facing closure.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Truth About Holly - Hawke and Dominic must protect Dominic's niece from a dangerous drug kingpin and find a new employee for Santini Air.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep16
programme.desc: It Ain't Over 'til Mrs. Howser Sings - While cleaning out the Howser garage, Doogie and Vinnie find some old home movies and screen them. One of them shows Mrs. Howser dressed as a 1960’s hippy singing with a rock band.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Dream Boat/ Best Of Friends/ Aftermath - Merrill gets a lucrative job offer on a super liner. Doc's former mentor Art is now a bitter amputee traveling with his guilt-ridden wife Laura. College friends Carol and Gwen both fall for passenger Paul Dunbar.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Old Flames - Sam’s newly divorced friend tries to come between him and Diane.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Tough Guys Don't Teach - The hospital sends Doogie to high school to teach safe sex practices as the Board of Education feels it would be beneficial for students to learn about such matters from a peer.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hunted - A mysterious industralist sends a group of brisk, dignified, and apparently super-efficient business people to make Dominic Santini an offer he can't refuse to use Santini Air, its personnel, equipment, and facilities for whatever exhorbitant price he comes to name.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep17
programme.desc: Hyde School Reunion - Phoebe accidentally casts a spell on herself that allows her wild teenage personality to take over, and teen Phoebe is eager to use her magic to her advantage.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Baby's First Paragraph - Tired of hearing how smart Gladys' baby nephew is, Endora uses witchcraft to make Tabitha talk fluently. The speech makes its way into the national news.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S7 Ep01
programme.desc: Trials And Tribulations - Jessica is accused of bribery and false testimony by the daughter (Carrie Hamilton) of a convicted murderer who is killed in an attempted jailbreak.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Surveillance - The brutal attack of a young cellist, Cassie Germaine in her apartment leads Detectives Benson and Stabler to investigate her orchestra conductor Robert Prescott.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Guilt - ADA Cabot goes above and beyond her duty in her search for evidence to convict the serial abuser, which led to an illegal search done by the detectives and in return jeopardises everyone involved.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Justice - Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the rape and murder of the stepdaughter of a judge known for his harsh sentencing of sex-offenders.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep02
programme.desc: Letters - The 4077th receives a parcel of letters from a fourth grade class from Hawkeye’s hometown and they quickly learn that not every question has an answer. The children ask surprisingly tough personal questions and each adult has the opportunity to reflect upon their experiences with the war. Some letters are more of a struggle that others but eventually each person manages to write about what the war has been like for them. The letter exchange is so successful that the 4077th soon receive a second sack of mail from another group of students.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep03
programme.desc: Cementing Relationships - Hot Lips finds herself the object of unwanted affections when she comforts an Italian soldier who has been jilted by his girlfriend. Hot Lips solves her problem by telling the enamored soldier that her heart already belongs to Charles Winchester. Meanwhile Hawkeye and B.J. discover the source of a problem with the sterility of their operating room. The wood floor is allowing germs to grow and make the wounded soldiers even more ill than their injuries. The only solution is against Army regulations but Hawkeye and B.J. shoulder the risk themselves and pour a cement floor for the operating room in secret. Charles is surprised when Hot Lips’ Italian paramour returns to camp and wants to face off with him for Hot Lips affections.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep04
programme.desc: Father's Day - The highly decorated war legend “Howitzer Al” Houlihan comes to the 4077th, and his visit is highly anticipated by one person in particular: his daughter, Margaret “Hot Lips” Houlihan. Margaret has always idolized her heroic and distant father and her emulation of his no-nonsense style becomes even more apparent during his visit. Margaret’s numerous attempts to gain the approval of her father are noticed by Col. Potter and he steps in to try and get her father to acknowledge his daughter’s success. Meanwhile, Hawkeye is dubious of a patient’s grateful promise of a steak dinner but he is pleasantly surprised.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep05
programme.desc: Death Takes a Holiday - The 4077th experiences the true meaning of Christmas giving, hosting a party for Korean orphans in the mess tent while working on a critically wounded soldier in the operating room. Charles Winchester becomes the camp scrooge when he selfishly refuses to contribute even the smallest morsel of his enormous Christmas package from home to the orphaned children’s holiday. B.J. Hunnicut, on the other hand, can’t stop giving in his efforts to save the life of a wounded soldier on Christmas Day.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep06
programme.desc: A War For All Seasons - The 1951 New Year’s celebration begins another twelve months of the simple joys and devastating hardships of war life with the 4077th. During this year we see Hot Lips take up knitting while Father Mulcahy cultivates a garden. Klinger and Charles Winchester become an unlikely alliance in a scheme to capitalize on the National League pennant race while Hawkeye and B.J. develop a strange enthusiasm for the Sears and Roebuck catalog.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep07
programme.desc: Your Retention, Please - The usually happy-go-lucky Klinger falls into a deep depression after reading a “Dear Maxie” letter from his ex-wife, La Verne. Klinger is so out of sorts he actually considers reenlisting for an additional tour of duty in the army. Fortunately for Klinger, his friends have been noticing his out-of-character behavior and Potter is able to step in and keep Klinger from making a hasty decision that he will soon regret. Meanwhile, Hawkeye and the other doctors are appalled that their most talented Corpsman is encountering so much hazing from the men in the unit as he attempts to become a nurse, and the doctors quickly step in to support their friend.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep19
programme.desc: Always A Thief - Charming jewel thief Dennis Stanton (Keith Michell), now an insurance investigator, becomes involved in two murders while checking into the theft of a valuable silver dollar.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep20
programme.desc: Shear Madness - While Jessica is in Texas to attend her cousin Ann's (Shirley Jones) wedding, the bridegroom is murdered, as was Ann's first fiance 15 years earlier.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Like Father, Like Son/ Don't Push Me/ Second Chance - A widower and his son (Robert Mandan and Randolph Mantooth) fall in love with the same woman (Cathy Lee Crosby); Isaac (Ted Lange) worries that a young woman on probation (Debbi Morgan), working in the gift shop, has stolen some jewelry; a henpecked man (Roddy McDowall) feels he's being pressured, by his girlfriend (Tammy Grimes), into marriage, against his will.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Disco Baby/ Alas, Poot Dwyer/ After The War/ Ticket To Ride/ Itsy Bitsy Part 1 - Julie's English teacher (Raymond Burr), a lonely alcoholic, is aboard ship for Julie's high school class reunion.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Doogie the Red Nosed Reindeer - It is Christmas Eve. The exhausted medical staff are working overtime in the E.R., where Paul, a nicely dressed but shoeless man, is brought in. He is in a confused state and thinks he is Darth Vader.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Greed is Good - At the persuasion of Vinnie, Doogie participates as a contestant on “High IQ”, a game show for geniuses. At the hospital, Joe E. Dunn is admitted, complaining of decreased vision.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Attack of the Green-Eyed Monster - Wanda becomes jealous when Doogie runs into—and is recognized by—Krista, a beautiful blonde whose shapely leg he had operated on. She invites him to a sorority party at UCLA as Wanda storms off.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Used Karma - Jason breaks up with Phoebe when he finally learns her and her sisters are really witches. Richard attempts to free himself of his family's karma, and Piper and Paige try to vanquish a group of Swarm demons.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep14
programme.desc: The Legend of Sleepy Halliwell - The Charmed Ones help out Leo's mentor, Gideon, when he wants to find out who cast the spell of darkness over a magic school and conjured the Headless Horseman who has been beheading the teachers.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep15
programme.desc: I Dream of Phoebe - When Phoebe frees a genie from a bottle, she soon finds that she must take the genie's place. Anxious to put Leo and Piper back together, Chris uses Phoebe to make his wish come true.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweet Britches - Hawke becomes the hunted prey on an Afican Hunt Club reserve when he goes in search of a friend who disappeared after escaping from the county jail.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Firestorm - After Dominic is injured, Hawke must team with an alcoholic ex-flier to stop a retired Army general from launching his own nuclear missile at Moscow.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Open Government - Jim Hacker MP receives the anxiously awaited call from Number 10 Downing Street with his new ministerial appointment. He has landed the job of Cabinet Minister to the Department of Administration.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep02
programme.desc: The Official Visit - The Minister has a plan to turn an official visit by the President of Buranda to party political advantage. He wants to move the President's meeting with the Queen to Scotland to coincide with the local elections.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep03
programme.desc: The Economy Drive - Pruning the civil service is a great political platform for the Minister but the idea is upsetting to Sir Humphrey Appleby. He explains that the civil service measures its success by the size of its staff and budget.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Big Brother - Jim Hacker MP is having some problems with decision making at the same time as he sets out to protect people's right to privacy. He meets with stiff resistance from Sir Humphrey.

programme.desc: Part 2 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.
