programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: The Supervet S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Trigger, Fury and Raven - Police dog Trigger has crushed sciatic nerves, feisty kitten Fury has a suspected tibia injury, and will shepherd doodle Raven get a new hip?

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Japan - Joel and Nish travel to Tokyo to meet Japan's professional sumo wrestlers before heading to the remote Oki Islands to take part in a tournament in the birthplace of Sumo.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Grasslands: In Plain Sight - The strategies used by animals to find and defend their mates in the grasslands of Namibia, the Serengeti and Australia. Here, mating strategies are on show for all to see.

programme.title: Big Cats: The Science of
programme.desc: Scientists are constantly making discoveries that reveal new insight into big cat behaviour and physiology. This programme explores big cats ranging from cheetahs to Andean mountain cats.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: Dynasties S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant - In Kenya, an incredibly rare event pushes a struggling elephant family to its limits. To save their dynasty, they have to work together and overcome the challenge of a lifetime.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep8
programme.desc: We follow the story of Amazon parcels, POSCO steel, Tabasco hot sauce and Kia cars, discerning the cutting edge science and engineering utilized in these superfactories.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: High Voltage Killer - After meeting several electric eel attack victims and hearing stories of people who lost their lives, Cyril is determined to catch the biggest one possible and measure its voltage. The only problem is how to avoid being electrocuted in the process.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venice, Albania and Turkey - Joanna starts her adventure in Venice, the European terminus of the Silk Road where she discovers how the Silk Road helped the merchants of Venice and the city state itself grow rich and powerful.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island Ep4
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Child of Fire Ep2
programme.desc: For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Florida Ep1
programme.desc: Florida is famous for its sandy shores—and there’s plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro Ep3
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Gates of Hell Ep3
programme.desc: Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Fires of Pele Ep4
programme.desc: The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Nova Scotia Ep2
programme.desc: At either edge of the province, Nova Scotia proves that any beach is built from raw forces in opposition, but also that balance between those forces is necessary if life is to thrive.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Birds of Prey Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Insect Eaters Ep3
programme.desc: Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Ghosts of Cederberg Ep1
programme.desc: A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Namib: Land Of Extremes Ep2
programme.desc: The Namib Desert is a land of extremes, from icy ocean to baking sand. It takes toughness and adaptation to live in this desert, and only a special few can. From the sidewinding adder to the fog-collecting beetle, each animal has their tricks for survival in the Namib.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - The Last Desert Giants Ep3
programme.desc: The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africa’s shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the world’s largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombia’s Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the island’s stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths who’ve now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep13
programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep39
programme.desc: A Butter Tomorrow / Days Of Future Present - A butter spill threatens the Harvey Lake ecosystem. Audrey, Dot and Lotta are determined to throw Richie the best birthday party ever.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep39
programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End Of The Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but it’s still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep39
programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep14
programme.desc: Show On The Road/Catherine The Great - Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep13
programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Edubot 4000 - Fed up with Dennis pulling the wool over Mrs Creechers eyes, Walter orchestrates a robot to take over Class 3C with disastrous results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dare Dennis - Dennis and the gang are suffering from dinner lady Olive’s completely inedible school dinners. In their mission to ‘drop the slop’, they discover a poster of her past career as a singer. Dennis’ eureka moment leads to asking her to join The Dinmakers - hoping she’d trade a life in the kitchen for the limelight. However after unleashing Olive’s inner diva their mission is to get Olive back into the kitchen!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep53
programme.desc: A Little Adventure - The team encounters a small problem when they land on a planet called Faunus, where they try to recharge their lions using a native element

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep1
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Paris to enter a cooking competition, Fearless Leader sends super spies Boris and Natasha after Bullwinkle to steal his secret recipe

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep14
programme.desc: Rollodons - When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Mall Walkers / Treasured Tattoo - Archibald stumbles upon a crime in progress while trapped in the mall overnight. A whale's tattooed map inspires Archibald to go on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey To The East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast And The Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes/Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep39
programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly… he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled… until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs… hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.desc: Rupert Builds A Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Growing with Blue - Come along as Josh, Blue and our friends learn that everything grows in different ways like fruits, vegetables, even you and Blue too! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what game Blue wants to play outside today.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at.

programme.desc: Abra-Ka-Pickle! - Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep506

PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Unidentified Flying Orchestra! - Strings! Brass! Woodwinds! Percussion! After Gil and Molly meet a conductor, the Guppies want to join an orchestra. Led by a conductor from another planet, the Guppies' orchestra will make music that's out of this world!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Return to Merlandia - The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons - Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta - It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Night of the Disco Lights - Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep998
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure Playoff - It's a special game show edition of Santiago of the Seas! Santiago, Tomas, and Lorelai have been trapped by Bonnie Bones and her crew. Play along to see if you have what it takes to set them free.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Temple of the Lost Puppy! - Bubble Puppy disappears after he bites down on ancient magic bone, so the Guppies must embark on an epic booby-trapped adventure to find their lost puppy!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Batterball! - Molly and Gil see how delicious bubblecakes are made when they step into Chef Stef's kitchen. The Guppies get their turn when they take the field to play batterball! It'll take teamwork to run the kitchen-station bases and bake a tasty treat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Where is Bali? - Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.desc: Pups Save a Walrus - When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep99
programme.desc: Running Around in Circles - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po run around in circles in Home Dome. The Noo-Noo joins in and the Teletubbies have fun chasing.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: Pizza - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pizza' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of pizza - a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep59
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When an erupting geyser disturbs the rabbits, the team helps them to find a more peaceful home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: It's time to find a butterfly - JoJo searches for a butterfly to complete her nature tick-book. She learns that all butterflies start life as furry little caterpillars.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: The Moving Badge - Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep45
programme.desc: Solar E-Glitch - After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: Zoo - Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Andy and the Marmosets - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to Brazil to take photos of a family of marmosets.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Cool Moving Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that all move in a really cool way! Grace has a drive in a lowrider and makes it bounce, and drives a drift car.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep13
programme.desc: Ye Old Piratey Butlaarrrs - Captain Captain has been reading about how captains of yonder years had 'butlaarrrs' in the Olde Book of Piratey Historrry. Captain Captain wonders if Sandy and Seaweed could try being her 'butlaarrrs'... but do they even know what a 'butlaarrr' is?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep42
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Irrigation - Uh oh! Glitch accidently uses his size-ray to shrink the Go Jetters and Ubercorn so that they are the size of ants!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep18
programme.desc: Percy The Snowman - Thomas agrees to share his special job with Percy, but whilst he's completing all of his other jobs, Thomas inadvertently covers his best friend in snow.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Toy Tidy - Duck has been leaving his toys everywhere, so Sarah decides to assist him with tidying his bedroom.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics, and are inspired by the Ribbon Sisters to put on a show.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: Ship Ahoy - It's so misty in the Camping Park that Nelly and Nora almost need a boat.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Say Cheese - To please Mum, Lola is determined to stay clean and tidy for her very first school photograph. but Lola's not very good at staying clean and tidy!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Be Alone - Dinopaw Mabel tells the firends how great it is to be alone, so they all head off in separate directions - but they soon get lonely.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Thing That We'd Never Seen Before - Gwen, Bob and Tony meet the world's longest dinopaw, who tells them that they will see something very exciting.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep2C/Ep6A/Ep9B/Ep13B/Ep18A/Ep22A/Ep23B
programme.desc: Tomb It May Concern/The Cat Nebula/Cat Got Your Luggage/Beefcake Tom/Invasion of The Body Slammers/The Declaration of Independunce/Snow Brawl - Jerry is a famed Egyptologist who discovers an ancient tomb. Tom is a crafty tomb raider, intent on raiding the riches until he comes face-to-face....

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep126/Ep134
programme.desc: Bunny Ball Hockey/Champions Of The Day - The Brave Bunnies revisit Dwayne the Moose in the Snowy Forest. He shows them how to score a goal in ball-hockey. Then it's Team Brave Bunnies versus Team Antler!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep52/Ep27
programme.desc: The Unforgettable Trip - Part 2/Giddy Up! - Alice has just moved into a new neighborhood but is nervous she might not be able to make new friends.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep227/Ep230
programme.desc: The Tootin Twosome/Mission Bedtime - Hugo and Fig are practicing their duet for Monsterdale Festival, but their song becomes endangered when Fig gets a case of the monster hiccups.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep105/Ep150
programme.desc: A Monchhichi For A Day/Cactus Mission - Aikor kidnaps Hanae and takes on her appearance then slips into the Tree incognito to steal a Glowing Fruit.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep126/Ep126
programme.desc: The Dino Doldrums/The Dino Doldrums - When the Ranch dinos come down with an illness, Blitz tries to hide that he's also getting sick, until his symptoms strike at the worst possible time!

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep327/Ep326
programme.desc: The Big Sky Park Egg Hunt/Lights, Camera, Big Sky Park - During an egg hunt, Stomper and Bubbles collect real eggs by accident.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep127/Ep135
programme.desc: Boot Castle/The Insult - Findley discovers a running shoe on the stairs that they use as a shoe fort, but a disagreement soon leads to Lucas creating his own shoe castle named Castle Shoe

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep3B/Ep55B/Ep108B/Ep13B/Ep65B/Ep118B/Ep23B
programme.desc: Leaf It Alone/The Color of Bunny/Papa's Got A Brand New Sam/The Spy Who Bugged Me/Easter Tweets/Dorlock and the Disorient Express/Coyote. Rabbit. Squirrel - Wile E. Coyote attempts to show Bugs the future of yard maintenance, with limited results.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep4/Ep48
programme.desc: Fish And Visitors/Gossamer Is Awesomer - Bugs and Daffy quickly discover that Yosemite Sam is a less-than-perfect houseguest when they are forced to take him in during a rainstorm. But how to get him to leave?

programme.title: Roger Ep143/Ep144/Ep145/Ep153/Ep154/Ep148/Ep156
programme.desc: Yes, No… It All Depends/What's Important Is Taking Part… And Not Losing/The Secret/Booster Shot/So Embarrassing/Gilbart/Bright Lights - Today, Roger and Fatou, helpful as ever, reply to demands from all their friends, no matter how silly or useless they happen to be. Our friends realize they just can’t say NO. So with help from Roger 3000, they begin a training program that is supposed to help them learn to say...NO! Of course everything gets out of hand and our two friends are horrified to learn that they are now incapable of saying YES! Another round of “reverse training” and our heroes immediately say YES to the crabs without even knowing why! Which is how they find themselves suddenly living in a house along with thousands of crabs from all the surrounding islands. Moral of the story: sometimes you should say YES sometimes NO, but it all depends right?

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Sera Naiqama and Sam Wykes are joined by NRL international Joe Galuvao and Morgan Te Oka to round up the Rugby League World Cup finals. Plus Sam and David Mead go head-to-head to decide the best code - League or Union.

programme.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution - Kids' Lunches Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - With just two episodes to go, the remaining three teams are fighting it out in the Revolution Kitchen. Samoa, Fiji and The Kingdom of Tonga go head-to-head to see which two countries will have a place in the grand finale!

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep214
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep229
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Drum Ep214
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak Ep212
programme.desc: Find out what's going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep206
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Second chance love is on the line for Bella and Nikau. Mackenzie and Logan can't keep their hands off one another. Martha worries the online auction is a bust.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep188
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson and the 7.30 team deliver insightful public affairs journalism, providing scrutiny of those in power, in-depth reporting on the biggest stories of the day, newsmaking interviews and special investigations.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep234
programme.desc: Lorna Dunkley brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Business Ep172
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Elysse Morgan.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep234
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects all Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Take 5 With Zan Rowe - Guy Pearce Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Zan Rowe sits down with Guy Pearce, a commanding actor but his first love is music. Reflecting on a life of opportunity, triumphs, tragedy and challenges, Guy shares his track list of the brilliant and surprising songs.

programme.title: The World Ep234
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Q+A Ep39
